name: 3D Request- Comment what you want 😀
description:
Hey 👋,

I'm Shubham, Let's see why I'm doing this 🤔?


In 2020 I started learning web development and I actually became really good at front end development 😃.

But my UI's used to suck 😖.

I wanted my website should look good and that's why I started learning web design 😅.

I made 20-30 Designs over the period of 2-3months 😒.

and In that time period I Used to see other peoples web designs.

and websites with 3D elements used to catch my eyes 😍.

but there were not many sources to find exact same 3D element as I wanted 😢and many of 3D elements were in packs with big amount to pay 💰.

then In 2021 I started learning 3D by myself following some youtube channels 😀.

and from 2021 to 2022 I became somewhat good at creating 3D stuff 😁


and now I want to help people and contribute to Designers community.


Just comment down Which element/illustration you want then I'll try to make it and add them to the next version.


I'll Update File almost after every 3-5days 🙃.
